TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PersonalizationDictionary extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IDictionary, class System.Collections.IEnumerable

summary.span: 封装基本验证规则，这些规则指示是否将一段自定义数据视为可在 或 范围内进行个性化设置。

span.span: Encapsulates basic validation rules that indicate whether a piece of custom data is considered personalizable in either or scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A实例是一个集合组成个性化设置范围和对象值的对象。A instance is a collection of objects, which consist of a personalization scope and an object value. 这些项分配中的键对象。These entries are assigned a key in the object. 很好的做法是将所有属性都添加到字典使用方法，而不考虑页范围。A good practice is to add all properties to the dictionary using the method, regardless of the scope of the page. .NET Framework 将信息保存在适当的方式;例如，共享的数据时，保存在页处于作用域。The .NET Framework saves the information in the appropriate way; for example, shared data is saved when the page is in scope. 但是，共享的属性将不会保存在正在保存 Web 部件值，该页面的是作用域，与控件已添加与中的页作用域。However, shared properties are not saved when a Web Parts value is being saved, the page is in scope, and the control was added with the page in scope.

summary.span: 向个性化设置字典添加个性化设置项。

span.span: Adds personalization entries to the personalization dictionary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以调用此方法，将放置到状态对象的自定义状态信息的各组成部分，并指定状态的值与关联的范围。You can call this method, place various pieces of custom state information into the state object, and specify the scope associated with the state value. 当控件处于作用域，您可以添加使用关联的名称和状态信息作用域或作用域。When a control is in scope, you can add name and state information that is associated with either scope or scope. 在作用域，您可以添加仅与关联的名称和状态信息作用域。In scope, you can add name and state information associated only with scope. 不过，它是很好的做法，将所有属性添加到字典包括具有属性或作用域，而不考虑页范围。It is a good practice, however, to add all properties to the dictionary using including properties with or scope, regardless of the scope of the page. .NET Framework 仅将与属性保存作用域在适当的时候。The .NET Framework only saves the properties with scope when appropriate. 换而言之，共享时，不会保存属性中最初添加的控件页中时，更高版本保存范围作用域。In other words, shared properties are not saved when a control that was initially added in scope is later saved while the page is in scope. 在相反的方案中，如果控件已添加到中的页页中时作用域和控件更高版本保存作用域，自定义的共享的属性值 （与自定义用户范围的属性） 一起保存。In an opposite scenario, if a control was added to the page in scope, and the control is later saved while the page is in scope, custom shared property values are saved (along with custom user-scoped properties). 个性化设置数据的详细信息和如何共享和用户范围的属性都受页上的个性化作用域，请参阅[Web 部件个性化概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)主题。For details on personalization data and how shared and user-scoped properties are affected by the personalization scope of the page, see the [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320) topic. 与任何集合，此方法递增集合计数 1，并应失效，任何当前活动对集合的枚举器。As with any collection, this method increments the collection count by one and any enumerators currently active on the collection should be invalidated.

span.span: Removes all custom state information from the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会清除从当前的所有自定义状态信息对象。This method clears all custom state information from the current object. 任何当前活动对集合的枚举器应将失效。Any enumerators currently active against the collection should be invalidated. 若要在个性化字典中删除仅特定个性化设置项，使用方法。To remove only a specific personalization entry in a personalization dictionary, use the method. 请注意，在一个空的个性化设置字典上调用此方法时，不会引发错误。Note that calling this method on an empty personalization dictionary does not raise an error.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性适用于对象，表示由标识的自定义的个性化信息`key`参数。This property works with a object representing custom personalization information that is identified by the `key` parameter. 如果没有为值`key`，`null`返回。If there is no value for `key`, `null` is returned. 如果`key`尚不存在，然后`key`（和其关联的值） 添加到字典。If `key` does not already exist, then `key` (and its associated value) are added to the dictionary. 请注意，你可以将 null 值添加到字典中，还可以使用索引器来更新的个性化设置值。Note that you can add a null value to the dictionary, and the indexer can also be used to update the personalization value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在内部，当删除自定义状态项时，将减少 1 个性化字典中的计数。Internally, when you remove a custom state entry, the count of the personalization dictionary is decremented by one. 任何针对字典当前处于活动状态的枚举器应将失效。Any enumerators currently active against the dictionary should be invalidated. 如果你尝试删除不存在的键，则会不发生任何错误。No error occurs if you attempt to remove a nonexistent key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法检查以确保的有效性的几个细节`value`和`key`然后再尝试将它们添加到个性化字典。The method checks several details to ensure the validity of `value` and `key` before attempting to add them to the personalization dictionary. 如果检查均成功完成，该方法调用类自己方法，并向它传递`key`和`value`参数。If the checks are successful, the method calls the class's own method, passing to it the `key` and `value` parameters.
